metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13618 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GPAC before 0.8.0, isomedia/isom_read.c in libgpac.a has a heap-based buffer over-read, as demonstrated by a crash in gf_m2ts_sync in media_tools/mpegts.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac11 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
